name: Contre-Nature
description:
Protect your crops against the invading giant plants!

The following is not needed to play the game, you may only read it if the in-game tutorial isn't clear enough.

Controls:

Move with WASD / ZQSD / Left Stick
Go left and right in your inventory with Left Arrow and Right Arrow / Scroll Wheel / Left and Right on DPad
Go up and down in your inventory with Up Arrow and Down Arrow / Mouse Wheel Click / Up and Down on DPad
Use the item you selected with Space Bar / Left Click / A Button
Collect grown crops with Left Shift / Right Click / B Button
Open and close the shop with Tab / X Button
Navigate in the shop with WASD / ZQSD / Arrow Keys / Mouse Pointer and Left Click / Left Stick / DPad
Buy the selected item in the shop with Space Bar / Enter / Clicking the Buy Button / A Button
Pause the game and access menu with Escape / Start
Toggle in-game tutorial with T key / Select
Toggle fullscreen with F11 (Well, in Web Format, prefer in-game button)

Plant your seeds by selecting them in the inventory, going on a dirt tile, and pressing the action button!
Giant plants may want to eat your crops, defend yourself using your scissors: select them in the inventory and press the action button to attack! You will have to wait a bit until you can use them again though...
Grown crops will display an arrow other them. Go over them and press the collect button to collect the money you get for reselling them.
If you have trouble aiming at a crop, select an item that shows the tile you're on (such as any seed).
You can then buy new crops in the shop using your well-earned money. Press the shop button, navigate to the item you want to buy and click the Buy button.
You will then have to switch items with the up and down inventory controls to find your newly bought items.
Hoes allow you to grow more crops by transforming grass tiles into dirt tiles. You may want to buy a more efficient one than the one you start with though...
Watering cans saves you a small amount of time in the growth cycle of a crop.
The Hammer can be used to gain a bit of time whilst fighting enemies!
Pressing the action button during an action will cancel it.
If you lose all money and seeds, you will want to restart using the pause menu.

Can you reach the ending by growing a sacred dandelion?

Random trivia about the game:

Enemies spawn at regular intervals with a cap number set depending on the value of the crops on the terrain.
The music changes with depending on the number of enemies.
